DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study characterize correlate diabetic macular edema ( DME ) , i.e . increase retinal thickness , measure Optical Coherence Tomograph ( OCT ) , retinal visual function . The secondary objective study analysis characterization DME progression time ( two visit ) , comparison OCT data obtain different device . The result study use exclusively scientific purpose .
DOC.brief_title: Retinal Thickness Analysis Using Optical Coherence Tomography
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis DR Females Males Age 18 year Signed Informed Consent Form Cataract eye disease may interfere fundus examination Vitreous syneresis posterior vitreous detachment Dilatation pupil < 5 mm
